text: dejiya Haweenkaas (cidada ku jira) meelahaad dagan tihiin eed heli kartaan, hana dhibina si aad u ciriiridaan, hadday uur leeyihiinna nafaqeeya (masruufa) intay ka umuulaan (kadhalaan), hadday ilmaha nuujiyaanna siiya ujuuro, wanaagna is fara, haddii laysku qabto nuujintana mid kale ayaa nuujin.
